title: Sh!t, Now What?: Becoming a New Adult
description: In this much needed, hilarious guide, Sh!t Now What? serves up 27 short-ish chapters on how to live life on your own. After being left to figure things out on her own, E Veal put together a collection of essays with a few expletives to help navigate life, finance, and labor.
author: E. Veal
